sentences.en: He always treats me as an eyesore.
He's not an eyesore, more like eye candy!
sentences.cn: 他可不是个眼中钉, 反而更像是眼中蜜啊!

sentences.en: His tie was an eyesore, but he had a pleasant, open face and an attractive grin.
sentences.cn: 他的领带鲜艳刺目, 面孔却坦率开朗, 笑容可掬,招人喜爱.

sentences.en: I think it is an eyesore.
sentences.cn: 我觉得它简直难看至极.

sentences.en: Our youth committee is going to clean up that eyesore.
sentences.cn: 我们的年轻委员要把那些看不顺眼的(丑恶)东西一扫而光.

sentences.en: Poverty leads to slums, which are an eyesore and a health hazard.
sentences.cn: 贫困产生了贫民窟，那里不仅有碍观瞻，而且卫生隐患严重。

sentences.en: That new multi - storey carpark is a real eyesore.
sentences.cn: 那座新的多层停车场实在难看.

sentences.en: That new shopping centre is a real eyesore.
sentences.cn: 那个新的购物中心真是难看极了.

sentences.en: That old block of flats is a real eyesore!
That old factory is a real eyesore!
The factory is an obtrusive eyesore.
The new curtains the boss picked are really an eyesore.
sentences.cn: 老板挑的新窗帘真的蛮刺眼的.

sentences.en: The scar on the polished tabletop is an eyesore.
sentences.cn: 光洁桌面上的那处损伤很碍眼.

sentences.en: This is an eye drop to relieve your eyesore.
sentences.cn: 这是眼药水,治眼睛痛的.

trans.tran_en: something that is very ugly, especially a building surrounded by other things that are not ugly
